entry.title: Café Adria (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the nightclub Café Adria survived a hit by a Karl-Gerät siege mortar (pictured)?

entry.title: a contemporary adaptation of "The Snow Queen" (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a contemporary adaptation of "The Snow Queen" contains feminist elements and, according to one scholar, violates gender expectations?

entry.title: Badger (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Badger is the first commander of the Unmanned Systems Forces?

entry.title: Yellow River Delta National Nature Reserve (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the borders of the Yellow River Delta National Nature Reserve were drawn to minimize impact on the Shengli Oil Field?

entry.title: Kevin Mejía (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that as a child, future Olympian Kevin Mejía sold spinning tops?

entry.title: Bikers for Trump (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Chris Cox, the founder of Bikers for Trump, estimated that 70 percent of its members are former military personnel?

entry.title: Feastogether (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Feastogether launched a restaurant that was Taiwan's highest-priced buffet when it opened in 2023?

entry.title: Blair Colony (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that while recruiting for the Blair Colony, Betty Blair reportedly convinced potential settlers that there were no flies in South Dakota?

entry.title: Sammy Virji (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the DJ Sammy Virji went viral on TikTok after cueing in a track with a rubber fish?
